short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better Linkedin Connections: Enhance your search, spotting employed, recruiters, and popular people easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Access LinkedIn: Open LinkedIn in your browser and log in.
2. Navigate to "My Network": Click the "My Network" link in the menu. If already there, reload it before using the Extension.
3. Refresh Visual Clues: Scroll through any number of pages, then click the extension icon to update the visual clues.

Note: The extension only applies the visual clues on the LinkedIn "My Network" page.

- Right click the extension icon (a pink "in") to view context menu options. Here, you can toggle features or access 'About' and 'Usage' information.

- Left click the extension icon to refresh the visual clues on the "My Network" page.

- Spot Employed Individuals: Profiles with a highlighted yellow box indicate employed individuals.

- Spot Well-Connected Profiles: Profiles with 10+ mutual connections display a larger orange label.

- Spot Employed & Well-Connected Profiles: Profiles with both employment and 10+ mutual connections feature a thick yellow border and a larger orange label.

- Spot Active Hirers: Profiles of people actively hiring are outlined with a thick purple border.

- Spot Non-Active Recruiters: Potential recruiters who aren't currently hiring will have a light purple border.

- Spot Profiles without a Photo: Profiles without a photo are outlined with a thick grey border.

Enjoy an enhanced LinkedIn Networks experience!

If you have questions, feel free to ask.ðŸ’—
